snippet: The former United States Open champion Samantha Stosur moved into the second round of the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio, with a 6-1, 7-5 win over Svetlana Kuznetsova.
abstract: Samantha Stosur defeats Svetlana Kuznetsova to advance to second round of Western & Southern Open tennis tournament in Mason, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: The former United States Open champion Samantha Stosur moved into the second round of the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio, with a 6-1, 7-5 win over Svetlana Kuznetsova.
